message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.SI 

The paper focuses on user authentication in smart home environments using IoT data. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as it deals with protecting user data and privacy. Additionally, the paper involves user interaction with IoT devices, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The use of machine learning algorithms to classify user behavior also falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also deals with cybersecurity (cs.CY) as it aims to improve authentication techniques in smart homes. Finally, the use of ensemble classifiers involves statistical learning (cs.SI).
